description:
Aidan Field was a soldier fighting for the moderate faction of Ctrigall, a country that is in a state of civil war with extremists who wants to return to the war. Not sure what to do with his money, he decided to use the service of Auto Memories Doll and entrusted http://anidb.net/ch89959 [Violet ]to write letters for his parents and his lover Maria before his death.
Source: Violet Evergarden Wiki
name: Aidan Field
